snippet.title: Akuto: Mad World - Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Akuto: Mad World will be available through Steam Early Access on December 1, 2016:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/530130/

Akuto: Mad World is a fast-paced multiplayer action game with swords and guns. Death is common but by using your weapons and the environment, you can survive to fight another day.
